verbs.description: SINGAPORE ( AP ) — As [ARG1: the world] [V: waited] , Donald Trump and Kim Jong Un sat by themselves for the better part of an hour , alone but for a pair of interpreters who became the sole witne

SINGAPORE ( AP ) — [ARGM-TMP: As the world waited] , [ARG1: Donald Trump and Kim Jong Un] [V: sat] [ARGM-MNR: by themselves] [ARGM-TMP: for the better part of an hour] , [ARGM-PRD: alone] but [ARGM-GOL: for a pair of interpreters who became the sole witne]

SINGAPORE ( AP ) — As the world waited , Donald Trump and Kim Jong Un sat by themselves for the better part of an hour , alone but for [ARG1: a pair of interpreters] [R-ARG1: who] [V: became] [ARG2: the sole witne]
